SELECT pmow.pay_merchant_order_water_code, pmow.pay_merchant_order_code, pmow.pay_merchant_order_status, pmow.pay_merchant_order_fail_message, pmow.pay_merchant_order_transaction_id, pmow.pay_merchant_order_refund_reason, pmow.pay_merchant_order_refund_transaction_id, pmow.pay_merchant_order_refund_code, pmow.pay_merchant_order_refund_create_time, pmow.pay_merchant_order_refund_success_time, pmow.pay_merchant_order_refund_user_received_account, pmow.create_time, pmow.pay_merchant_order_wallet, (SELECT pay_merchant_name FROM pay_merchant WHERE pay_merchant_code = pmo.pay_merchant_code) payMerchantName, pmo.pay_merchant_order_product_name, pmo.pay_merchant_order_product_code, pmo.pay_merchant_order_price, pmo.pay_merchant_order_total_price, pmo.pay_merchant_order_trade_type, pmo.pay_merchant_order_origin, pmo.pay_merchant_order_attach
FROM pay_merchant_order_water pmow INNER JOIN pay_merchant_order pmo ON pmo.pay_merchant_order_code = pmow.pay_merchant_order_code
WHERE pmow.pay_merchant_order_status <> '1000'
AND pmo.pay_merchant_order_origin <> 'RECHARGE'
AND (pmo.pay_merchant_order_origin = 'RECHARGE' OR pmo.pay_merchant_order_code = '4002')
AND pmo.pay_merchant_order_user_id IN
#{userId}
AND pmo.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
ORDER BY pmow.create_time DESC
